title: [45w#71] [osu!lazer] 2020.523.0 更新日志
author: 45gfg9
txt_content:
osu!lazer 2020.523.0 [ruby=更新日志]Changelog[/ruby]
osu!lazer at GitHub
Release page
那个 模版真的没人要么
Code Quality 代码质量
[√] Remove obsolete method (osu-framework#3552) author: smoogipoo
[√] 移除废弃方法 (osu-framework#3552)
[√] Use some new features in .net standard 2.1 (osu-framework#3554) author: huoyaoyuan
[√] 使用.net 2.1标准中一些新特性 (osu-framework#3554)
[√] Replace all BASS fail assertions with describing-exceptions (osu-framework#3555) author: frenzibyte
[√] 替换所有BASS失败断言为描述性异常 (osu-framework#3555)
[√] Unify number types in performance calculators (osu#9055) author: huoyaoyuan
[√] 统一pp计算器中的数字类型 (osu#9055)
[√] Use DrawableSample in SkinnableSound class (osu#9068) author: peppy
[√] SkinnableSound类中使用DrawableSample (osu#9068)
[√] Remove obsolete members (osu-framework#3572) author: smoogipoo
[√] 移除废弃方法 (osu-framework#3572)

Editor 编辑器
[√] Seek to start of placed object, not end (osu#9071) author: peppy
[√] 查看放置物件的开始，而非结束 (osu#9071)
[√] Refactor editor snapping logic and add osu!mania beat snapping support (osu#9070) author: peppy
[√] 重构编辑器 (osu#9070)
[√] Implement beat snapping grid for mania's editor (osu#9021) author: smoogipoo
[√] 为mania编辑器实现beat对齐网格 (osu#9021)

Framework 框架
[√] Fix ModelBackedDrawable not working inside BufferedContainer (osu-framework#3551) author: smoogipoo
[√] 修复BufferedContainer中的ModelBackedDrawable不工作 (osu-framework#3551)
[√] Introduce Colour4 type (osu-framework#3537) author: swoolcock
[√] 引入Colour4类型 (osu-framework#3537)
[√] Colour4 functions and tests (osu-framework#3562) author: swoolcock
[√] Colour4的函数和测试 (osu-framework#3562)

Gameplay 游戏体验
[√] Allow disabling SkipOverlay through AllowGameplayOverlays. (osu#9018) author: Game4all
[√] 允许通过AllowGameplayOverlays取消SkipOverlays (osu#9018)
[√] Silence hitsounds during seek operations (osu#9075) author: peppy
[√] 在寻找操作时静音打击音效 (osu#9075)
[√] Fix display start time in sequential scroll algorithm (osu#9080) author: bdach
[√] 修复在顺序滚动算法中显示开始时间 (osu#9080)
[√] Eliminate floating point inaccuracies when generating bar lines (osu#9050) author: bdach
[√] 修复生成小节线时的浮点数精确度问题 (osu#9050)

Gameplay (osu!taiko) 游戏体验 (osu!taiko)
[√] Fix taiko rim markers incorrectly playing as whistle samples (osu#9057) author: peppy
[√] 修复taiko边缘标记不正确地播放哨声音效 (osu#9057)

Multiplayer 多人游戏
[√] Fix being able to press enter to create matches (osu#9061) author: smoogipoo
[√] 修复可以按回车创建比赛 (osu#9061)

Performance 性能
[√] Prefer memory overloads for Stream.ReadAsync/WriteAsync (osu-framework#3525) author: turbedi
[√] 对Stream.ReadAsync/WriteAsync优先使用内存重载 (osu-framework#3525)
[√] Fix LifetimeManagementContainer not unbinding events on clear (osu-framework#3563) author: smoogipoo
[√] 修复LifetimeManagementContainer清除时不解除绑定事件 (osu-framework#3563)
[√] Improve WeakList<> performance in degenerate scenarios (osu-framework#3561) author: smoogipoo
[√] 改进糟糕情况下的WeakList<>性能 (osu-framework#3561)

Reliability 可靠性
[√] Fix possible exceptions in performance calculators (osu#9053) author: smoogipoo
[√] 修复pp计算器中可能的异常 (osu#9053)
[√] Convert dangerous events to IBindables (osu#9062) author: peppy
[√] 转换危险事件为IBindables (osu#9062)

Results 结果
[√] Hide catch-specific judgements in mania (osu#9048) author: bdach
[√] 隐藏mania中的catch专属判定 (osu#9048)

Storyboard 
[+] Add support for storyboard overlay layer (osu#9064) author: bdach
[+] 支持storyboard覆盖层 (osu#9064)

Testing 测试
[√] Remove all RequiredTypes usages (osu#9042) author: smoogipoo
[√] 删除所有RequiredTypes使用 (osu#9042)
[√] Avoid disabling a host-level bindable from osu! code (osu#9031) author: peppy
[√] 避免在osu!代码中禁用主机级别可绑定对象 (osu#9031)
[√] Dispose of font stores in base game (osu-framework#3556) author: bdach
[√] 删除基础游戏中的字体存储 (osu-framework#3556)
[√] Limit the number of nodes expanded for dynamic compilation (osu-framework#3553) author: smoogipoo
[√] 限制动态编译时的节点展开数量 (osu-framework#3553)
[√] Fix beatmap-online-lookup-queue potentially throwing on OsuGameTestScene (osu#9089) author: frenzibyte
[√] 修复可能抛出OsuGameTestScene的在线谱面查询队列 (osu#9089)

Tournament 锦标赛
[+] Add a back button to sub screens in the Tournament Client (osu#9041) author: MiraiSubject
[+] 为锦标赛客户端在副屏添加返回按钮 (osu#9041)

UI 界面
[√] Fix user profile section display highlighting wrong section (osu#9023) author: Fukashi13
[√] 修复用户档案界面高亮显示错误 (osu#9023)
